alston.minecraft

Class Torch

  • java.lang.Object
    • alston.minecraft.Block
      • alston.minecraft.Torch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Torch
extends Block
implements java.io.Serializable
    An Object of this class represents a torch: A Block that does not naturally spawn (must be crafted). It takes up the same space as a Block, but appears to be smaller. It also emits a PointLight that will illuminate the surroundings.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • changeToBlock

        public void changeToBlock(int type,
                 boolean updatePhysics)
        Description copied from class: Block
        Changes the Block's type to something else. For efficency purposes, It simply changes the relevant values, and only replaces with an entirely new Block when determines necessary by the Factory.
        Overrides:
        changeToBlock in class Block
        Parameters:
        type - The new type of the block
        updatePhysics - If the physics should be updated afterwards (Should be false only when generating terrain to optimize time)
